sentences.en: Blessed is the man who is not attached to any corruptible or transitory thing.
sentences.cn: 不执著于任何堕落或无常的事物的人,是有福的.

sentences.en: But forgiveness blots out bitterness from human heart like transitory ripples on water.
sentences.cn: 但是宽恕能够从人心中清除痛苦就像水中暂时泛起的波纹.

sentences.en: Foolish men mistake transitory semblance for eternal fact ( Thomas Carlyle )
sentences.cn: 愚蠢的人误以为暂时的表象是永恒的事实 ( 托马斯·卡莱尔 )

sentences.en: For a transitory enchanted moment man must have breath in the presence of this continent.
sentences.cn: 在那昙花一现的神妙的瞬间,人面对这个新大陆一定屏息惊异.

sentences.en: In the final analysis, most of life's joys are transitory.
sentences.cn: 归根结底, 尘世间的欢乐大多是过眼烟云,转瞬即逝.

sentences.en: Love is transitory but it is eternal.

sentences.cn: 绝大多数青少年的恋情都转瞬即逝。

sentences.en: Never use transitory dialogs as error messages or confirmations.
sentences.cn: 绝不要用临时对话框作为错误信息框或确认信息框.

sentences.en: Once again, Vermeer succeeded in transforming a transitory image into one of eternal truth.
sentences.cn: 维梅尔又一次成功地将短暂的画面转变成永恒的真理.

sentences.en: That is transitory or semipersistent in its vector.
sentences.cn: 在它的介体中是属于中间的或半持久的.

sentences.en: The current situation: Transitory the fate that is numerous network a favourite by sb in power.
sentences.cn: 现状: 昙花一现是众多网络红人的宿命.

sentences.en: The definition implies two resultant temperatures, transitory and steady state.
sentences.cn: 该定义包括有瞬时的和稳态的两种合成温度.

sentences.en: the transitory nature of his happiness
They are of a partial and transitory nature.
sentences.cn: 是部分性质的,暂时性质的.

sentences.en: This false world is but transitory ( William Dunbar ).
sentences.cn: 这个虚幻的世界只是昙花一现( 威廉邓巴 ).

trans.tran_cn: 不持续的，短暂的，转瞬即逝的，朝露
trans.tran_en: continuing or existing for only a short time
